entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
